column5: Went to Red Lake for the first time last year and found really good Walleye. Im going back the last week of July this year and would really like to find some good pike fishing. So can any of you tell me about the Pike in Red Lake? We will be on the West end of the lake. Thanks
here is a link to an article detailing midsummer pike hunting. you will encounter the same patterns. good luckhttp://www.anglerskingdom.com/reportsandarticles.html
Thanks KG. I had read those before 2 or 3 years ago and had kind of forgotten. This time I printed them out so I can take them with me.
Anyone fish for pike in Red lake ON.?

Ya, we do a bit, run up the Chukuni river to the rapids and cast there, just to the left of the rapids is a good spot. Gets a bit crowded up there so maybe get there early, good walleye spot too.Points with weed lines, bays with axcess to deeper water, there are some big northerns in that lake.Al
